head.title: Kimberly Betz Married To David M. Woodman

hedline.hl1: Kimberly Betz Married To David M. Woodman

block.p: LEAD: Kimberly A. Betz, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Charles K. Betz of New Caanan, Conn., was married there yesterday to David M. Woodman, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Charles E. Woodman of Laurel Hollow, L.I. The Rev. James J. Benson officiated at the United Methodist Church. Mrs. Woodman, 27 years old, is the assistant to the president, and her husband, 31, is the president of the Woodman Construction Company and Punchlist Inc.

LEAD: Kimberly A. Betz, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Charles K. Betz of New Caanan, Conn., was married there yesterday to David M. Woodman, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Charles E. Woodman of Laurel Hollow, L.I. The Rev. James J. Benson officiated at the United Methodist Church. Mrs. Woodman, 27 years old, is the assistant to the president, and her husband, 31, is the president of the Woodman Construction Company and Punchlist Inc.

Kimberly A. Betz, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Charles K. Betz of New Caanan, Conn., was married there yesterday to David M. Woodman, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Charles E. Woodman of Laurel Hollow, L.I. The Rev. James J. Benson officiated at the United Methodist Church. Mrs. Woodman, 27 years old, is the assistant to the president, and her husband, 31, is the president of the Woodman Construction Company and Punchlist Inc. in New York. She is a graduate of Dickinson College. Her father is a director of United States marketing and services for the International Business Machines Corporation in Southbury, Conn. The bridegroom's father is a senior vice president of Smith Barney, Harris Upham & Company in New York.
